category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_loader_itemrevision_general_properties
preference.preference_description: Defines the item revision's properties list displayed in the General section of the Properties tab. Attributes display in the Loader based on the order defined in this preference. Possible values are real name of attribute and following keywords: - display.all_only: to display only all attributes in the tab (should be the only value defined in the preference) - display.separator: to display a horizontal separator in the tab
